title: Morimens Tier List
description: Discover the latest Morimens character tier list, ranking the best and worst characters from S to C tier to optimize your gameplay strategy.
heading: Morimens Tier List
introText: Discover the latest Morimens character tier list, ranking the best and worst characters from S to C tier to optimize your gameplay strategy.

data.itemDescription: Capable of temporarily reducing all enemies' strength, drawing additional cards, and generating Silver Key energy, effectively managing resources and supporting the team
Specializes in retaliate mechanics, he offers solid duplicates across his abilities, allowing him to be integrated into diverse team compositions effectively
As a character of the "Flesh" archetype, she manages blood resources, allowing her to heal allies and enhance their abilities through the use of "blood embryos"
A character capable of regularly generating permanent tentacles through non-Rouse cards, and increasing the maximum tentacle limit with her Rouse card, thereby boosting team attacks

A support unit from the Chaos faction, Hameln enhances team performance by providing power boosts, card draws, and the ability to double-cast any card. Each turn, he generates a special card that allows playing a card at reduced cost or double-casting it for increased cost. His versatility makes him a valuable asset in any team composition
Horla's abilities significantly contribute to the team's success

A versatile character whose abilities adapt based on team composition. In the Chaos faction, 24's ultimate ability charges s-energy, enabling double use of posse and delivering substantial damage. In the Aequor faction, she inflicts significant poison damage. Her adaptability allows her to fit effectively into various team strategies

A key figure in the Aequor faction, Tulu excels in generating and enhancing tentacles, which are central to Aequor's playstyle. His capabilities make him a strong choice for players focusing on this faction's mechanics
With emotions like "Fear" and "Sorrow" that boost power, poison, retaliate stats, and enhance shielding and healing effects, Nautila is highly valuable in retaliate-focused teams
A character from the Aequor faction, Celeste offers reliable performance and can be a valuable team member, though she may not reach the exceptional impact of higher-tier characters
Also hailing from the Aequor faction, Goliath provides solid contributions to the team. While effective, he doesn't exhibit the standout qualities

Renowned for her unique abilities related to tentacle mechanics. By using her Rouse card, Miryam increases the maximum tentacle limit by 1 and creates one permanent tentacle, making her valuable in teams focused on tentacle utilization
While possessing unique abilities, Sorel often falls short in comparison to more dominant characters, making him a less favorable choice for competitive play
After using her Rouse card, she generates a temporary tentacle with each card played, amplifying team attacks, especially when combined with Deep Sea mechanics
